DataDetectPolicyObject.name: DataDetectPolicyObject
DataDetectPolicyObject.description: Represents an object of the DataDetect scan policy to be scanned. This object is available in API version 62.0 and later.

DataDetectPolicyId.description: ID of the scan policy associated with this scan policy object. This field is a relationship field.

Name.description: Name of the scan policy object.

ObjectReference.description: Name of the scan policy object to be scanned.
